attributes.action: TELL US why EVERYTHING to do with a politician or a political appointee breaking that law MUST ALWAYS BE KEPT SECRET.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in upper case lettering.  You seem, so often, to be unable to decipher what it is we want you to do.  We hope this is helpful.

Today on Radio 4 an MP said that the Police must always tread more carefully when dealing with child sex abuse allegations involving parliamentarians than child sex abuse involving anybody else.  Today it is reported the NCA cannot violate the human rights of an alleged criminals because what he is suspected of doing - pornography offences - might violate his right to life.  That the suspected person is an ex aide at Number 10 Downing Street - the source of ALL crime in this country - means that he is also being treated differently to the man in the street.  JUST WHY IS THAT Mr Slippery?  You need to tell us.
